employee_profile_summary.learning_style: Prefers hands-on learning with real-world projects

upcoming_projects: Implementation of real-time data processing pipeline
performance_highlights: Needs improvement in system architecture design

critical_priority.description: Design scalable, distributed systems and microservices architectures
Lead technical teams, mentor developers, and drive technical decisions

medium_priority.description: Implement automated deployment pipelines and infrastructure as code
Optimize application and database performance at scale
Implement security-first design and development practices

course_structure.course_title: Advanced Financial Analysis and Technical Leadership for Mid-Level Developers
learning_objectives: Master system architecture design for financial systems
Develop technical leadership skills within financial analysis projects
Understand and apply cloud architecture principles using AWS/Azure for financial data
Integrate advanced financial analysis tools (Excel, SAP BPC, PowerBI) into daily workflows
Apply real-world financial scenarios to improve business performance reporting

weeks.theme: Foundation of System Architecture in Finance

modules.learning_outcome: Understand the basics of system architecture and its importance in financial systems.
Apply system design principles to create robust financial models in Excel.

modules.module_name: Principles of Cloud Computing in Finance
modules.learning_outcome: Gain an introductory understanding of cloud computing principles relevant to financial data.
Learn the qualities of technical leadership and how to apply them in financial projects.
Implement AWS solutions for enhanced financial data analysis and reporting.
Understand how to leverage Azure for financial data storage, analysis, and reporting.

modules.module_name: Advanced Excel Techniques for Financial Analysis
modules.learning_outcome: Master advanced Excel functions and techniques for complex financial analysis.

modules.module_name: Leveraging SAP BPC for Financial Planning
modules.learning_outcome: Implement SAP BPC for effective financial planning and performance management.
Create impactful financial reports and dashboards using PowerBI.

modules.module_name: Applying Technical Leadership in Financial Projects
modules.learning_outcome: Apply technical leadership skills in managing and executing financial analysis projects.

modules.module_name: Cloud Architecture Solutions for Real-World Finance Problems
modules.learning_outcome: Design and implement cloud architecture solutions for complex financial scenarios.

modules.module_name: Advanced Scenario Analysis with Integrated Tools
modules.learning_outcome: Conduct advanced scenario analysis using a combination of financial tools for strategic decision-making.
